hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'It is not permissible to sell something that is not with you, nor to profit from what you do not possess

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ، مَا لَيْسَ عِنْدَكَ وَعَنْ رِبْحِ، مَا لَمْ يُضْمَنْ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Selling What Is Not With You, And From Profiting On What You Do Not P
